snippet.title: REVENGE CRYSTAL - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2713680/REVENGE_CRYSTAL/

REVENGE CRYSTAL is a Metroidvania and Souls-like Action RPG where you play as an amnesiac knight on a mission to save a shattered world and defeat mysterious invaders. Using a combination of sword, bow, and magic, you can collect elemental crystals to customize your abilities, changing the elemental damage to exploit enemy weaknesses as you explore interconnected areas filled with challenges, enemies, and puzzles.
